biotools.summary: Detect and quantify CNVs in prokaryotic whole-genome sequencing data. After aligning WGS reads to a reference genome, we count the individual reads in a sliding window and normalize these counts for bias introduced by differences in GC content.

bioschemas.name: CNOGpro
bioschemas.summary: Detect and quantify CNVs in prokaryotic whole-genome sequencing data. After aligning WGS reads to a reference genome, we count the individual reads in a sliding window and normalize these counts for bias introduced by differences in GC content.
